Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Chiko, were you involved in the mission recorded in the file "Jett 713642"?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiko', 3: 'Yeah. It was a long time ago.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's a bit strange, here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'The Construct named Jett said the following in a vocal range only Specialized Constructs can hear.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiko', 3: "I can't hear it."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Let me translate it for you.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bianca says it as she taps the data panel of the KI.GAL Archives. The projection of the Babylonia airdrop platform soon appears in the dim space.'}
{3: 'Bianca quickly fast forwards the video, eventually stopping near the end of the recording.'}
{3: 'In the recording, the glow of the power grid around Jett gradually fades. He holds himself up with his weapon, barely managing to stand instead of kneeling.'}
{2: 'Jett', 3: "Doctor, perhaps you don't get it, but this is something that has made us truly feel alive."}
{2: 'Jett', 3: "We've chosen different ways to die, but at least we get to feel what freedom is like while we're alive."}
{2: 'Jett', 3: 'But freedom comes at a price, of course.'}
{2: 'Jett', 3: 'Freedom has been a false proposition since we were made into Constructs.'}
{2: 'Jett', 3: 'We still chose to run from it even though we knew it was the truth.'}
{2: 'Jett', 3: "Perhaps your courage in telling the truth has invoked our passion for adventure, something that we've almost forgotten."}
{2: 'Jett', 3: 'Thank you...'}
{3: "The glow of the power grid fades completely. A member of the Purifying Force pulls the trigger at that moment, and half of Jett's face is blown away by the explosive shell."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Why did he choose to convey the message in such an unusual way?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiko', 3: 'Should we include the Doctor... Wanshi on the purifying list?'}
{3: "Bianca thinks for a while, then removes Jett's speech from the file."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's not necessary. It has nothing to do with the doctor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Jett "never left" a special dialogue in the end.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chiko', 3: 'I see.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "(Wanshi...? I think I've heard the name from Commander Nikola before...)", 4: '1'}
